name: Kale: The Leafy Green Monster
description: Photograph from zero-g on Flickr I always thought that kale was supposed to behave like spinach. Granted, I haven't done much cooking with it, but I assumed that when exposed to heat it would wilt and shrivel down to...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 lbs russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/4 inch slices
1 1/2 lbs kale, stemmed and torn into small pieces (about 16 cups, although I suggest halving this amount)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and sautée until translucent, 8 minutes. Add chorizo and paprika and stir for 1 minute. Add the potatoes and chicken stock and increase heat to boil. Add kale and stir until soup returns to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
